sentences.en: Computers are incapable of creative thought.
sentences.cn: 计算机不会创造性地思维.

sentences.en: He felt they were incapable of understanding him.
sentences.cn: 他觉得家里的人都不能够了解他.

sentences.en: He is incapable of discriminating between a good idea and a terrible one.
He lost his job for allegedly being incapable.
sentences.cn: 据说他由于软弱无能而丢掉了工作。

sentences.en: He seemed incapable of understanding how she felt.
sentences.cn: 他似乎不能理解她的感受。

sentences.en: He would be incapable of committing such a cruel deed.
sentences.cn: 他不会做出这么残忍的事.

sentences.en: I'm incapable of walking far today because I've hurt my foot.
sentences.cn: 我今天不能走远,因为脚受了伤.
无能的经营管理断送了公司.

sentences.en: It is legally possible for an elderly person to nominate someone to act for them, should they become incapable of looking after themselves.
sentences.cn: 从法律上来说，如果老人生活不能自理，他可以指定某人为其代理事务。

sentences.en: No man was more incapable of flashy make - believe than Mr. Casaubon.
sentences.cn: 卡苏明先生与别人不同,从不弄虚作假.

sentences.en: Seventy-five percent of the electorate believe his party is incapable of government.
sentences.cn: 75%的选民都认为他领导的政党无能力执政。

sentences.en: She seemed incapable of making the decision.
sentences.cn: 她似乎无法做出这个决定。

sentences.en: She seemed incapable of taking decisions.
Since I'm incapable of saying no, I agreed to everything.
sentences.cn: 由于我不会说“不行”, 我就一切都答应下来.

sentences.en: The children seem to be totally incapable of working by themselves.
sentences.cn: 孩子们好像完全不能独自做事。

sentences.en: The company seems to be incapable of hanging on to its staff.
sentences.cn: 公司似乎无力留住职员.

sentences.en: The injured man was incapable of walking, so he had to be carried.
sentences.cn: 那个受伤的人不能行走, 因此必须抬着.

sentences.en: The wine had made him incapable of thinking clearly.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒下肚,他就无法清醒地思考了.

words.tran_cn: 无能力；无资格；不能胜任
丧失能力，欠缺行为能力（incapacitate的过去分词）
使无能力；使不能；使不适于

trans.tran_cn: 无能力的，不会的，不能的，[法]没有资格的，不舞之鹤
